LABEL: 0x126
STRING: 「Good work.」

LABEL: 0x149
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x163
STRING: My work was done――

LABEL: 0x19D
STRING: And just as I was about to take a breather...

LABEL: 0x1E8
STRING: There was the sound of a door opening.

LABEL: 0x213
STRING: 「Everyone――」

LABEL: 0x234
STRING: Hiragino's voice blew away all my fatigue at once.

LABEL: 0x268
STRING: Had Hikari woken up...?

LABEL: 0x28A
STRING: I immediately stood up and tried to enter the treatment room but was blocked by Hiragino with his arms spread wide.

LABEL: 0x352
STRING: 「Wait, wait, don't rush.」

LABEL: 0x3D1
STRING: 「Put this on, just in case.」

LABEL: 0x3FC
STRING: Hiragino handed me a plastic mask and gloves.

LABEL: 0x42E
STRING: Did I really need these at this point? I guess I should obey him since this was the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x49C
STRING: I quickly put on the gloves and mask, and Hiragino invited me into the treatment room.

LABEL: 0x556
STRING: There――

LABEL: 0x56E
STRING: ――On the bed.

LABEL: 0x58E
STRING: The girl in white had her eyes slightly open.

LABEL: 0x61F
STRING: Tokiwa was kneeling beside her.

LABEL: 0x658
STRING: 「Do you understand, Rumi-chan?」

LABEL: 0x682
STRING: 「It's your sister...」

LABEL: 0x6B5
STRING: 「...Nee...san?」

LABEL: 0x6DE
STRING: Hikari still looked dazed and unaware.

LABEL: 0x716
STRING: Thank goodness...

LABEL: 0x73A
STRING: While she had been breathing in her sleep, so I knew she was alive,

LABEL: 0x78E
STRING: seeing her awake like this made me feel at ease.

LABEL: 0x7EC
STRING: She let out a quiet sigh with her eyes still half-closed.

LABEL: 0x847
STRING: 「Was that a dream?」

LABEL: 0x86F
STRING: 「It felt like... I was surrounded by a beautiful light.」

LABEL: 0x8A1
STRING: 「I think I saw something like that.」

LABEL: 0x8D2
STRING: Hikari began to talk in a small voice.

LABEL: 0x8FE
STRING: Holding her chest, she spoke slowly as if trying to remember something.

LABEL: 0x95D
STRING: 「When I woke up... No one was there.」

LABEL: 0x98D
STRING: 「So, I went to the window.」

LABEL: 0x9B9
STRING: 「I looked out the window and...」

LABEL: 0x9DD
STRING: 「――There was a mermaid.」

LABEL: 0xA04
STRING: With that, Hikari smiled at Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xA42
STRING: A mermaid, huh?

LABEL: 0xA5C
STRING: What kind of a metaphor was that supposed to be?

LABEL: 0xA8A
STRING: I couldn't help but think about it.

LABEL: 0xAC5
STRING: 「Did the mermaid say anything?」

LABEL: 0xAFA
STRING: Tokiwa asked her gently. She seemed to be acting like a proper older sister.

LABEL: 0xB5E
STRING: Tokiwa... I could feel myself getting moved.

LABEL: 0xB90
STRING: Hikari nodded back quietly――

LABEL: 0xC2C
STRING: 「"Humans are the kindest creatures in the world."」

LABEL: 0xC6A
STRING: 「――That's what she said.」

LABEL: 0xC93
STRING: Hikari smiled even brighter while saying that.

LABEL: 0xCC1
STRING: Her unclouded smile struck a chord in my guilt-ridden heart――

LABEL: 0xD0F
STRING: As a carrier of <Alice>, she'd been kept alive while still infected.

LABEL: 0xD5D
STRING: On the other hand, her sister, Tokiwa, was given gene therapy to make use of her brain.

LABEL: 0xDB5
STRING: These girls―both of them―were kept alive for the convenience of adults.

LABEL: 0xDF7
STRING: It wasn't according to their will, they weren't informed of anything, and they were simply made to live as tools.

LABEL: 0xE4B
STRING: How were they able to remain so innocent?

LABEL: 0xE8B
STRING: Or perhaps... they had to remain innocent.

LABEL: 0xED3
STRING: At the bottom of this dark sea, her pure white appearance was almost painful.

LABEL: 0xF89
STRING: 「That mermaid――」

LABEL: 0xFA7
STRING: 「I think it was the second time we'd met.」

LABEL: 0xFE3
STRING: 「I'm sure the mermaid wanted to be human.」

LABEL: 0x1015
STRING: 「To do that, she has to go to the surface――」

LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: The fairy tale of a mermaid princess――

LABEL: 0x107C
STRING: She had to become a human in order to go up to the surface.

LABEL: 0x10B0
STRING: However, in reality, other organisms had gone up to the surface first.

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: They went up to the surface, saw the wide world, and evolved.

LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: Their goal wasn't to become human.

LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: But as a result, we have this world inhabited by humans.

LABEL: 0x11C7
STRING: 「Rumi-chan, listen carefully.」

LABEL: 0x11F7
STRING: 「You're going to go up to the surface now.」

LABEL: 0x1238
STRING: 「The surface?」

LABEL: 0x12B4
STRING: Hikari looked around restlessly.

LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: I felt like my eyes met hers.

LABEL: 0x142E
STRING: She clapped her hands together, then turned back to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1533
STRING: 「Come to think of it, I was on the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x1570
STRING: 「I caused a lot of trouble for a lot of people...」

LABEL: 0x15C3
STRING: 「...Did you see the sea?」

LABEL: 0x1657
STRING: 「The sea?」

LABEL: 0x1672
STRING: Hikari tilted her head in confusion.

LABEL: 0x170A
STRING: 「The sea is what you wanted to see, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: 「More than the sea...」

LABEL: 0x17CC
STRING: 「I'm glad I met you, Onee-san.」

LABEL: 0x1843
STRING: She squeezed Tokiwa's hand.

LABEL: 0x1875
STRING: Tokiwa squeezed hers in return.

LABEL: 0x1893
STRING: Finally able to talk with each other, the sisters continued holding each other's hands wordlessly.

LABEL: 0x18DD
STRING: If only this scene could go on forever――

LABEL: 0x1911
STRING: However, our time limit was approaching.

LABEL: 0x1950
STRING: 「...Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x19DC
STRING: 「――Yes, I know.」

LABEL: 0x1A15
STRING: 「Even though we just met...」

LABEL: 0x1A39
STRING: 「Is this goodbye already?」

LABEL: 0x1A66
STRING: Hikari asked reluctantly.

LABEL: 0x1A8C
STRING: Tokiwa stood up and spoke to her as gently as she could.

LABEL: 0x1B95
STRING: 「It'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x1BAD
STRING: 「I'll catch up with you later.」

LABEL: 0x1BDD
STRING: 「I promise.」

LABEL: 0x1BF7
STRING: 「Has your sister ever broken a promise?」

LABEL: 0x1C9B
STRING: After thinking for a moment, Hikari lowered her head to the side.

LABEL: 0x1CCF
STRING: The way she acted made her seem so childish...

LABEL: 0x1D01
STRING: Physically she looked young already, but due to <Alice>, her heart seemed even younger.

LABEL: 0x1D5D
STRING: ROMLES had imprisoned an innocent girl who didn't know right from wrong, whether people were being honest or not――

LABEL: 0x1DC5
STRING: She had to be protected.

LABEL: 0x1DEB
STRING: We had to get her to the surface, no matter what.

LABEL: 0x1E68
STRING: 「Then let's get going.」

LABEL: 0x1E9B
STRING: We managed to get Hikari, who was unsteady on her feet, to stand up and move her to the diving suit.

LABEL: 0x1EF9
STRING: We put the diving suit on her, which had its weights removed earlier...

LABEL: 0x1F35
STRING: Or rather, we put Hikari inside the diving suit.

LABEL: 0x1F6D
STRING: Against the spacious diving suit, her slender body looked too small.

LABEL: 0x1FBD
STRING: Not only was she small, she didn't seem to have any muscles at all, probably due to being asleep for so long.

LABEL: 0x2025
STRING: If she wasn't careful, she could probably slip her arms into the torso section.

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: She had the diving suit on, but it wasn't like she could walk around in it.

LABEL: 0x211D
STRING: 「That's right, I mustn't forget.」

LABEL: 0x214E
STRING: Hiragino put a triage tag on Hikari's finger and flipped the switch.

LABEL: 0x2198
STRING: That signal would probably lead her to survival.

LABEL: 0x2240
STRING: 「I hope your stamina lasts...」

LABEL: 0x2271
STRING: Hiragino muttered worriedly.

LABEL: 0x22A2
STRING: 「I'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x22C7
STRING: Hikari responded through the glass of her diving suit.

LABEL: 0x22F5
STRING: ...Her voice was somewhat uneasy, but she looked healthy enough with her loose smile.

LABEL: 0x2375
STRING: Hiragino and I carried her in her diving suit into the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x23C7
STRING: We also brought the other diving suit into the cramped pressurization room and fastened them with the wires we'd procured from the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x2429
STRING: 「Does it hurt?」

LABEL: 0x2458
STRING: 「Not one bit.」

LABEL: 0x247D
STRING: I believed her words.

LABEL: 0x24A3
STRING: Just as I was about to close the door to the pressurization room...

LABEL: 0x24E2
STRING: 「Rumi-chan!」

LABEL: 0x2505
STRING: Tokiwa rushed inside.

LABEL: 0x252D
STRING: Through her diving suit, their eyes met.

LABEL: 0x25CD
STRING: 「I'll be right with you.」

LABEL: 0x264E
STRING: 「Good luck.」

LABEL: 0x2675
STRING: Hikari smiled silently.

LABEL: 0x2712
STRING: And then, the pressurization room was closed.

LABEL: 0x2740
STRING: Water began pouring in immediately.

LABEL: 0x2764
STRING: Tokiwa watched on without moving an inch, not being able to do anything else.

LABEL: 0x27B0
STRING: Finally, once the water was poured,

LABEL: 0x27D6
STRING: Hikari

LABEL: 0x27EC
STRING: embarked for the surface――

LABEL: 0x2A84
STRING: After finishing our first operation,

LABEL: 0x2AA8
STRING: the <SHEEP III> had a relaxed atmosphere about it.

LABEL: 0x2AFE
STRING: 「She was found infected by <Alice> on a beach.」

LABEL: 0x2C39
STRING: Reiri had been the one who brought Hikari into the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x2C7C
STRING: She spoke to no one in particular inside the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2D20
STRING: 「At the time, she said she saw a mermaid.」

LABEL: 0x2D64
STRING: 「As you know, <Alice's> natural host has yet to be discovered.」

LABEL: 0x2DAE
STRING: 「In which case, one could think of it this way...」

LABEL: 0x2DEC
STRING: 「That maybe there really was a mermaid in these waters――」

LABEL: 0x2E7D
STRING: 「...As if.」

LABEL: 0x2E9B
STRING: 「She must have mistaken a whale for one or something.」

LABEL: 0x2EEC
STRING: The mermaid that the girl in white said she saw――

LABEL: 0x2F18
STRING: Was it really just a dream?

LABEL: 0x2F3E
STRING: Or, had she seen a whale or something crossing the side of the ship the moment she happened to wake up?

LABEL: 0x2F9E
STRING: Was it a fantasy born from a fairy tale she'd read as a child mixing with reality?

LABEL: 0x2FEC
STRING: I didn't know what the truth was.

LABEL: 0x3078
STRING: ――I didn't know, but...

LABEL: 0x309C
STRING: At this moment.

LABEL: 0x30B2
STRING: Anything could be out there in this sea.

LABEL: 0x30E6
STRING: So, I felt like I could believe that mermaids existed as well.
